ModMetaData.name: Dubs Skylights Addon
ModMetaData.author: BJR1984
ModMetaData.description: Simple window for allowing sunlight to pass through constructed roofs. Powered by Harmony I added a 1x2, 1x3, 2x3, 2x4, 3x4, 2x5, 2x6, 2x7, 4x4, 1x5, 1x6, 1x7, 1x8, 1x9, 1x10, 1x11, 1x12, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8, 9x9, 10x10, 11x11, 12x12, Added Dropdown Groups 4.1.4 - added 1.4 support label 4.1.5 - added all skylights smaller than 12x12 that were missing 5.0.0 - rimworld 1.5 support
